Women's Tests.Only WTest: Pakistan at Colts Cricket Club Ground, Colombo; 17-20 April 1998

Women's One Day Internationals.First WODI: Netherlands at Sinhalese Sports Club Ground, Colombo; 25 November 1997
Women's One Day Internationals.Last WODI: India at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy; 7 July 2022

Women's Twenty20 Internationals.First WT20I: Pakistan at the County Ground, Taunton; 12 June 2009
Women's Twenty20 Internationals.Last WT20I: India at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla; 27 June 2022
